column1: * 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letters Letter 287 and Letter 288.
* 1981 - The tenth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 1997 - The second day of Bree Moot 3 in wikipedia:Minneapolis.
